languages.text: "Стратегический анализ указывает на всеобщее массированное наступление как на оптимальный метод действий. Потери //личного состава//малозначимого персонала//мирян// будут высоки, однако не превысят допустимых параметров. Восполнить их будет проще, чем восстановить повреждения, нанесенные мануфакторумам".

"Our strategic analysis points toward a full-scale offensive as the optimal course of action. The losses among the //troops//insignificant personnel//laity// will be numerous but will not exceed acceptable parameters. Replenishing such losses will be less arduous than repairing the damage that may otherwise come to the manufactorums."
languages.original_text: "Стратегический анализ указывает на всеобщее массированное наступление как на оптимальный метод действий. Восполнить их будет проще, чем восстановить повреждения, нанесенные мануфакторумам".

traits.locale_text: "Strategic analysis suggests a general offensive to be the optimal course of action. The losses among the //troops//insignificant personnel//laity// will be numerous but will not exceed acceptable parameters. Replenishing such losses will be less arduous than restoring the damage that may otherwise come to the manufactorums."

languages.text: “我们的战略分析表明，全面进攻是最佳行动方案。全面进攻会导致//部队//非重要人员//平民//遭受大量损失，但并不会超过可接受的范围。弥补这些损失，比修复制造工厂受到的损害要容易得多。”
languages.original_text: "Our strategic analysis points toward a full-scale offensive as the optimal course of action. The losses among the //troops//insignificant personnel//laity// will be numerous but will not exceed acceptable parameters. Replenishing such losses will be less arduous than repairing the damage that may otherwise come to the manufactorums."

traits.locale_text: “我们的战略分析表明，全面进攻是最佳行动方案。全面进攻会导致//部队//非重要人员//平民//遭受大量损失，但并不会超过可接受的范围。弥补这些损失，比修复制造工厂受到的损害要容易得多。”

languages.text: « Notre analyse stratégique suggère qu'une offensive à grande échelle serait optimale. Les victimes parmi //les troupes//le personnel négligeable//les profanes// seront nombreuses, sans toutefois dépasser les paramètres acceptables. Il sera plus simple à moyen terme de compenser ces pertes que de réparer les dégâts potentiels causés aux manufactorums. »
languages.original_text: "Our strategic analysis points toward a full-scale offensive as the optimal course of action. The losses among the //troops//insignificant personnel//laity// will be numerous but will not exceed acceptable parameters. Replenishing such losses will be less arduous than repairing the damage that may otherwise come to the manufactorums."

traits.locale_text: « Notre analyse stratégique suggère qu'une offensive à grande échelle serait optimale. Les victimes parmi //les troupes//le personnel négligeable//les profanes// seront nombreuses, sans toutefois dépasser les paramètres acceptables. Il sera plus simple à moyen terme de compenser ces pertes que de réparer les dégâts potentiels causés aux manufactorums. »

languages.text: 「我々の戦略分析では、全面的な攻勢が最適な行動方針であると示されています。//部隊//重要な人員//信義//の損失は多いでしょうが、許容範囲を超えることはないはずです。聖工場にもたらされるかもしれない損害を復興するより、このような損失の補充するほうが容易です」
languages.original_text: "Our strategic analysis points toward a full-scale offensive as the optimal course of action. The losses among the //troops//insignificant personnel//laity// will be numerous but will not exceed acceptable parameters. Replenishing such losses will be less arduous than repairing the damage that may otherwise come to the manufactorums."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の戦略分析では、全面的な攻勢が最適な行動方針であると示されています。//部隊//重要な人員//信義//の損失は多いでしょうが、許容範囲を超えることはないはずです。聖工場にもたらされるかもしれない損害を復興するより、このような損失の補充するほうが容易です」

languages.text: «Nuestro análisis estratégico sugiere que el curso de acción óptimo sería una ofensiva a gran escala. Las pérdidas de //tropas//personal prescindible//laicos// serán numerosas, pero no excederán los parámetros aceptables. La reposición de dichas pérdidas será menos ardua que restaurar los daños que puedan sufrir los manufactorums».
languages.original_text: "Our strategic analysis points toward a full-scale offensive as the optimal course of action. The losses among the //troops//insignificant personnel//laity// will be numerous but will not exceed acceptable parameters. Replenishing such losses will be less arduous than repairing the damage that may otherwise come to the manufactorums."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro análisis estratégico sugiere que el curso de acción óptimo sería una ofensiva a gran escala. Las pérdidas de //tropas//personal prescindible//laicos// serán numerosas, pero no excederán los parámetros aceptables. La reposición de dichas pérdidas será menos ardua que restaurar los daños que puedan sufrir los manufactorums».

languages.text: "Unsere strategische Analyse deutet auf eine groß angelegte Offensive als optimale Vorgehensweise hin. Die Verluste an //Truppen//unbedeutendem Personal//Mitgliedern des Laienstands// werden hoch sein, jedoch innerhalb akzeptabler Parameter liegen. Solche Verluste aufzufüllen, wird weniger aufwändig sein, als die Schäden zu beheben, welche die Manufactorien andernfalls nehmen könnten."
languages.original_text: "Our strategic analysis points toward a full-scale offensive as the optimal course of action. The losses among the //troops//insignificant personnel//laity// will be numerous but will not exceed acceptable parameters. Replenishing such losses will be less arduous than repairing the damage that may otherwise come to the manufactorums."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere strategische Analyse deutet auf eine groß angelegte Offensive als optimale Vorgehensweise hin. languages.text: "Stratejik analizlerimize göre ideal harekât planı, tam saldırı olacaktır. //Birlikler//Ehemmiyetsiz personel//Ruhban dışı sınıf// zayiatı azami düzeyde olabilir ancak kabul edilebilir parametreleri aşmayacaktır. Bu zayiatların iskânı, öbür türlü manufaktorumlara verilebilecek hasarın giderilmesinden çok daha meşakkatsiz olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Our strategic analysis points toward a full-scale offensive as the optimal course of action. The losses among the //troops//insignificant personnel//laity// will be numerous but will not exceed acceptable parameters. Replenishing such losses will be less arduous than repairing the damage that may otherwise come to the manufactorums."
